Ailment.name: Blastblight
Ailment.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

Ailment.name: Bleeding
Ailment.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

Ailment.name: Dragonblight
Ailment.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

Ailment.name: Effluvial Buildup
Ailment.description: Effluvial buildup causes damage over time, and eventually cuts your maximum health in half if ignored for too long.

Ailment.name: Fireblight
Ailment.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

Ailment.name: Iceblight
Ailment.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

Ailment.name: Paralysis
Ailment.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

Ailment.name: Poison
Ailment.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

Ailment.name: Sleep
Ailment.description: Sleep renders the hunter or monster inactive and susceptible to increased damage, but only for the first hit, as it will then wake them up.

Ailment.name: Stun
Ailment.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

Ailment.name: Thunderblight
Ailment.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

Ailment.name: Waterblight
Ailment.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

Ailment.name: Wind Pressure
Ailment.description: Wind pressure causes the hunter to brace against powerful winds, causing temporarily imobility.

Ailment.name: Defense Down
Ailment.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

Ailment.name: Muddy
Ailment.description: A status effect inflicted when mud thrown by a monster covers the Hunter and makes movement more difficult. Slows all actions until the hunter leaves the mud.
